name: Eventual Pong
description:
Pong, a classic among games. A minimalist work of art. The simplest tale of war. Two batons enter, one baton leaves, and then immediately returns with the ball to continue the match.

Relive the classic with a modern, high-art twist: Your opponent is about half an hour away. Wage the war of attrition, in perpetuity, to maintain your score, and to keep ahead of that other person who's been playing almost as long as you but downloaded it just a few hours after you.
